name: lightTree

name: foodTree
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, add 2 more for each building adjacent

name: naviTree
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, for every milestone you finished, add 1 happiness

description: add 2 happiness per harvest, for each construction building you built, add 1 happiness

description: add 2 happiness per harvest, a random neighbour building harvest again.

name: magicTree
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, pay time increase 1.

name: hovercraft
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, light up horizontally

name: sails

description: add 2 happiness per harvest, for each flying object you collect, happiness +1  per harvest

name: constructionSail
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, when you connect to a castle in the sky, add 10 happiness more per harvest

name: entertainingSail
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, when you collect a flying object, randomly harvest a building next time

name: magicSail

name: hovercraft
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, remve all fogs in last miestone

name: sails
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, if it hit the milestone line, +30 happiness per harvest

name: foodSail
description: add 2 happiness per harvest, based on the building's distance from the horizontal center

name: constructionSail

name: entertainingSail

name: magicSail
